description: ADDS Harness Configuration - Built for deletion, designed for evolution

philosophy.principle: Build for deletion - anticipate that new models will obsolete current logic
philosophy.approach: Modular design with clear interfaces and documented rationale

dual_agent_pattern.reason: Current models benefit from clear role separation between initialization and incremental coding

alternatives.name: unified_agent
alternatives.trigger: Model demonstrates ability to handle both initialization and coding in single context

regression_check.reason: Models still introduce breaking changes when adding new features

alternatives.name: disable_regression_check
alternatives.trigger: Model demonstrates zero regression rate over 100 features

atomic_commits.reason: Context management still limited - single feature per session prevents scope creep

alternatives.name: multi_feature_session
alternatives.trigger: Model demonstrates reliable multi-feature context management

environment_validation.reason: Environment consistency is still a challenge across sessions

tool_based_validation.reason: Models still need explicit evidence requirements to avoid premature completion claims

alternatives.name: trust_based_validation
alternatives.trigger: Model demonstrates 99%+ accuracy in completion assessment

command_whitelist.reason: Security guardrails still necessary to prevent dangerous operations

data_collection.reason: Training data collection is core value proposition of Agent Harness

alternatives.name: enhanced_data_collection
alternatives.trigger: Infrastructure ready for model training feedback loop

future_considerations.name: multi_agent_collaboration
future_considerations.description: Multiple agents working on independent features in parallel

future_considerations.name: continuous_learning
future_considerations.description: Real-time adaptation of harness based on performance metrics
